package.name: Net_Ping
package.description: OS independet wrapper class for executing ping calls

release.notes: * Fixed support for Debian (Bug #707) (jan) * Ignore options to setArgs which are unsupported by the backend (jan) * Refactoring (jan) * Fix path in testcase (Bug #707) (mj) * Prevent a infinite exec call to ping by setting a sane default - of 3 packages to be sent (jan)
* Added AIX support * Added testcases for Darwin, NetBSD, FreeBSD, HP-UX and AIX * Added getMin(), getMax(), getAvg(), getStddev(), * Fixed the parsers to return correct variable types
* Added darwin and hpux support * Fixed minor code glitches * Made code more readable
* Added result object * Introduced PEAR error handling
* Rewrite to handle platform differences * Added the checkHost() method * Added parameter to specify maximum wait time (-w)
